name: Blow Up Artillery Sim 3D
description: Blow Up Artillery Sim 3D - Plunge into the incredible world of tank war in this simulator. You have to control One Man soldier, direct the forces of the artillery blow up and destroy the waves of enemies. Show miracles of accuracy, speed and agility, hold the front, save your country and become a hero. You are the last hope, so be prepared to try. Get on the position and go!
